overview: Jennifer had a nice house, a nice boyfriend, a nice life, until one fateful day when it all went wrong. An unforeseen accident unlocks her past, and an erotic, dangerous world unfolds. A world filled with sex, contract killers, and broken hearts. Who is she? What is her past? What does it all mean? Jennifer must piece it together, and find out who is behind her brutal attempted murder.
title: Crash
